entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
